name: Stefanos Sizzling Pizza Pie
description:
Steffano needs your help! Someone broke the door to his kitchen and now bugs can smell his wonderful pizza! Protect Stefanos from the bugs while he creates his amazing pizza pies. Stefanos Sizzling Pizza Pie is a fast paced reflex clicker with simple but challenging game play. What starts off easy as levels go by, the insect waves gradually ascends into a frenzy of plague proportions to fend off. With endless increasing difficulty and multiple speed settings Stefanos Sizzling Pizza Pie will challenge even the most agile gamers.

Features:
Simple Challenging Game Play
Fast Paced Action
Endless Increasing Difficulty
Multiple Speed Settings
